Serenity Island Resort A world of relaxation and new discoveries await you at Serenity Island Resort. Blending timeless elegance and Fijian style design, set against the backdrop of a tropical island, Serenity Island provides the perfect island escape for romance, adventure and relaxation. With world class service, indulgent comforts and eco experiences a standout as one of Fiji's most iconic resorts. The resort on Serenity Island is a convenient yet secluded paradise, only a short boat ride from Viti Levu. The 48-acre tropical island is the closest private island to the mainland and a short trip by boat to and from Vuda Marina.
